title: Covid-19 Second Wave: Bhubaneswar In Odisha Turns 'High Risk', Know The Hot Spots |OTV News
description: The second wave of corona virus seems to have hit the State Capital in a big way. With the number of new cases per lakh people in the Smart City taking a leap from over 8 cases per lakh population to around 12.9 today, the City has been designated as a high risk one.

title: Odisha Covid-19 Second Wave Peak Likely In May 1st Week, State In Pre-Peak  Stage Now |OTV News
description: Spreading like a forest fire, the second wave of coronavirus in Odisha has virtually entered the pre-peak phase in just 48-days.  Given the brisk rise, the State will be witnessing the peak in May first week only.

title: Daily cases surge past 1,000 in Odisha, up by 46% in 24 hours
description: The daily caseload breached the 1,000-mark for the first time this year. Of the fresh cases spread across 28 districts, 755 were in quarantine and 527 local infections.
